attributes.action: End the practice of destroying unnused medicines in the NHS. They should either be re- dispensed or sent to countries where they are unavailable.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unnused medications dispensed by the NHS have to be destroyed, which is a shameful waste. These drugs could be returned and re-dispensed under the NHS or allocated to charities, which could use them in areas of the world where people are dying for lack of simple treatment.
